name: Quantum Pulse
description:
Quantum Pulse is a shooting game where you need to defend your base from invading enemies. The catch however is that every time new wave begins, past ghost of you will be in play as well as a threat. The longer you survive, more ghosts will be shooting lasers all over the place.

WASD to move and click to shoot. 

White bar on top is base Hp that will constantly deplete. Regain Hp by picking up green health pickups.  When the bar depletes, you lose. When the counter in the middle of the screen reaches 0, new wave will begin. If your ship gets destroyed it will be respawned at the beginning of a new wave.
